类 MyInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • MyInterface

  • public class MyInterface
extends java.lang.Object

    Title: MyInterface

    Description: This class defined the UI for user to use to choose which function to use

    CSE210, XJTLU

    作者:
    Zhaorui Zhang

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法

      Title: containerFormulator Description: Form three kinds of container which are hash map for quickly finding details according name, array list to store researcher whole information and hash set to store topic without duplicate

      static void startInterface()

      • containerFormulator

        private static void containerFormulator(org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFRow row,
                                        int[] cellIndex,
                                        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Researchers> map,
                                        java.util.ArrayList<Researchers> reaserchList,
                                        java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> topicSet)

        Title: containerFormulator

        Description: Form three kinds of container which are hash map for quickly finding details according name, array list to store researcher whole information and hash set to store topic without duplicate

        row -
        cellIndex -
        map -
        reaserchList -
        topicSet -
